title: A Deadly Sin
description:
In this episode, Sapphire shares stories about the root of all evil: greed. Listen to an old urban legend from Spain, ride along a late night delivery, hunt for buried treasure, and pay a visit to Crimson Grove.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
